p: JL received research support and speaking fees from Gilead Sciences, MSD, and ViiV outside of this work. KS-H received support for this work from the HIV Outcomes Beyond Viral Suppression coalition, which is supported by Gilead Sciences and ViiV. GB received honoraria for lecturing and for expert advice from Gilead Sciences, ViiV, Janssen, MSD, and Sandoz outside of this work. JA received honoraria for lecturing and for expert advice from Gilead Sciences, ViiV, and MSD, and also received support for conference attendance from Gilead Sciences outside of this work. The remaining authors declare that the research was conducted in the absence of any commercial or financial relationships that could be construed as a potential conflict of interest.
